text: Hey Rasheed, no worries at all! I've been very busy myself so I understand. Yeh I'd love to see your cinematic when you've got time to send it over. Blue Zoo is going well! We've finished that R&D project a while back but it's looking promising, I think it might be a few updates away from being fully usable for production. I did develep a custom ui to help with ray-tracing settings so that it almost acts like a 'Render Settings' window in Maya. Tell me more about your new project!
